title: WebSite Management Client
description: Use these APIs to manage Azure Websites resources through the Azure Resource Manager. All task operations conform to the HTTP/1.1 protocol specification and each operation returns an x-ms-request-id header that can be used to obtain information about the request. You must make sure that requests made to these resources are secure. For more information, see https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dn790557.aspx.

Provider_GetSourceControls.title: Gets the source controls available for Azure websites

GlobalCertificateOrder_GetAllCertificate.title: Lists all domains in a subscription

GlobalDomainRegistration_CheckDomainAvai.title: Checks if a domain is available for registration

GlobalDomainRegistration_GetAllDomains.title: Lists all domains in a subscription

GlobalDomainRegistration_GetDomainContro.title: Generates a single sign on request for domain management portal

GlobalDomainRegistration_ListDomainRecom.title: Lists domain recommendations based on keywords

TopLevelDomains_GetGetTopLevelDomains.title: Lists all top level domains supported for registration

Global_CheckNameAvailability.title: Check if resource name is available

Global_GetAllHostingEnvironments.title: Gets all hostingEnvironments (App Service Environment) for a subscription

CertificateOrders_GetCertificateOrders.title: Get certificate orders in a resource group

CertificateOrders_DeleteCertificate.title: Deletes the certificate associated with the certificate order

CertificateOrders_GetCertificate.title: Get certificate associated with the certificate order

CertificateOrders_UpdateCertificate.title: Associates a Key Vault secret to a certificate store that will be used for storing the certificate once it's ready

CertificateOrders_CreateOrUpdateCertific.title: Associates a Key Vault secret to a certificate store that will be used for storing the certificate once it's ready

CertificateOrders_UpdateCertificateOrder.title: Create or update a certificate purchase order

CertificateOrders_CreateOrUpdateCertific.title: Create or update a certificate purchase order

CertificateOrders_RetrieveCertificateAct.title: Retrieve the list of certificate actions

CertificateOrders_VerifyDomainOwnership.title: Verify domain ownership for this certificate order

Domains_GetDomainOperation.title: Retrieves the latest status of a domain purchase operation

Usage_GetUsage.title: Returns usage records for specified subscription and resource groups

Certificates_GetCertificates.title: Get certificates for a subscription in the specified resource group.

Certificates_DeleteCertificate.title: Delete a certificate by name in a specified subscription and resourcegroup.

Certificates_GetCertificate.title: Get a certificate by certificate name for a subscription in the specified resource group.

Certificates_UpdateCertificate.title: Creates or modifies an existing certificate.

Certificates_CreateOrUpdateCertificate.title: Creates or modifies an existing certificate.

ClassicMobileServices_GetClassicMobileSe.title: Get all mobile services in a resource group.

Certificates_UpdateCsr.title: Creates or modifies an existing certificate signing request.

Certificates_CreateOrUpdateCsr.title: Creates or modifies an existing certificate signing request.

ServerFarms_GetServerFarms.title: Gets collection of App Service Plans in a resource group for a given subscription.

Sites_GetSites.title: Gets the web apps for a subscription in the specified resource group

Sites_ListSiteBackups.title: Lists all available backups for web app

Sites_DiscoverSiteRestore.title: Discovers existing web app backups that can be restored

Sites_DeleteBackup.title: Deletes a backup from Azure Storage

Sites_GetSiteBackupStatus.title: Gets status of a web app backup that may be in progress.

Sites_GetSiteBackupStatusSecrets.title: Gets status of a web app backup that may be in progress, including secrets associated with the backup, such as the Azure Storage SAS URL. Also can be used to update the SAS URL for the backup if a new URL is passed in the request body.

Sites_ListSiteMetadata.title: Gets the web app meta data.

Sites_ListSitePublishingCredentials.title: Gets the web app publishing credentials
